Chapter Previous Next

class gstSpatialObject

Base class intended for all GHOST objects of spatial extent. This class allows access to functionality common to such classes.

From header file: gstSpatialObject.h

Constructors and Destructors
~gstSpatialObject
gstSpatialObjectThis class is intended as a base class only, the constructor is protected so that instances can not be created.
Functions
cloneSpatialObject Return a copy of this object as a gstSpatialObject.
getClassTypeId Get type of this class.
staticIsOfType Returns TRUE if subclass is of type.
Virtual Functions
cloneReturn a copy of this object as a gstSpatialObject.
getBoundingBoxReturn the bounding box of the object.
getBoundingSphereReturn the bounding sphere of the object.
getContainedObjectsGather the collection of objects contained within this object.
getTypeIdGet type of this instance.
intersectFirstInOut_LS_PIntersects gstLineSegment with spatial object and returns gstIntersection::intersectionType which can be;
intersectFirstInOut_LS_PSOIntersects gstLineSegment with spatial object and returns gstIntersection::intersectionType which can be;
intersectFirstInOut_Ray_PIntersects gstRay with spatial object and returns gstIntersection::intersectionType which can be;
intersectFirstInOut_Ray_PSOIntersects gstRay with spatial object and returns gstIntersection::intersectionType which can be;
intersectFirstIn_LS_PIntersects gstLineSegment with spatial object and returns gstIntersection::intersectionType which can be;
intersectFirstIn_LS_PSOIntersects gstLineSegment with spatial object and returns gstIntersection::intersectionType which can be;
intersectFirstIn_Ray_PIntersects gstRay with spatial object and returns gstIntersection::intersectionType which can be;
intersectFirstIn_Ray_PSOIntersects gstRay with spatial object and returns gstIntersection::intersectionType which can be;
intersectFirstOut_LS_PIntersects gstLineSegment with spatial object and returns gstIntersection::intersectionType which can be;
intersectFirstOut_LS_PSOIntersects gstLineSegment with spatial object and returns gstIntersection::intersectionType which can be;
intersectFirstOut_Ray_PIntersects gstRay with spatial object and returns gstIntersection::intersectionType which can be;
intersectFirstOut_Ray_PSOIntersects gstRay with spatial object and returns gstIntersection::intersectionType which can be;
